message.content: {"id": "49536", "title": "Bug 49536 - No content returned when accessing URL in empty Tomcat 7 instance", "description": "When accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance with no deployed webapps, a response with HTTP status code 200 OK is returned without any content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.", "OB": "Accessing a URL in an empty Tomcat 7 instance returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content.", "EB": "The expected behavior is for the server to return an HTTP error 404 when accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance without any deployed webapps.", "SR": "Please modify the server behavior to return an HTTP error 404 when accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance with no deployed webapps."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '49536', 'title': 'Bug 49536If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404', 'description': 'Ali Tokmenhttp://ali.tokmen.com/ ', 'OB': '', 'EB': "HelloI've just downloaded http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zipIf I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps on it and access a URL, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of an HTTP error 404.CheersS. ", 'SR': ''}
